definition: Beijing/capital of People's Republic of China/one of the four municipalities 直轄市|直辖市[zhi2 xia2 shi4]
north/(classical) to be defeated
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The office in BeiJing will offer the help according to the condition.

sentences.english: I was chosen as one of“The Big Ten Prominent Youths”of Beijing in 1996.
sentences.chinese: 我1996年被評爲“北京市十大傑出青年”。

sentences.english: I'm living at 22 Chaowai Street, Apt. 608, Chaoyang District , Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 我現在住在北京市朝陽區朝外大街22號608室。

sentences.english: Prospects of monitoring the warning signs of earthquakes in the Beijing area are forwarded to improve the monitoring level.
sentences.chinese: 文中也分析了提高北京市地震監測水平需努力的方向。

sentences.english: The city government labels it “community-style management.”

sentences.english: Its predecessor is Beijing Timber Plant's dismountable house subsidiary.

sentences.english: This reporter learned yesterday from Beijing bureau.
sentences.chinese: 這是記者昨天從北京市水利局瞭解到的。

sentences.english: Delivery is free of charge within the Beijing area.
sentences.chinese: 北京市區送貨是免費的。

sentences.english: Therefore, Sinolgis has currently established a green motorcade in Fangshan District in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 因此，華儲現已在北京市房山區建立綠色車隊。

sentences.english: This reporter learned yesterday from Beijing Capital Construction Commission.
sentences.chinese: 這是記者昨天從北京市建委瞭解到的。

sentences.english: The honourable Mr. Guo Jinlong, Mayor of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的北京市人民政府市長郭金龍先生。

sentences.english: Maple Garden won the Award of the Top 10 Star Areas of Beijing in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 東潤風景曾榮獲2000年北京市十大明星樓盤獎。

sentences.english: To be sure, it was a beautiful little cottage.
sentences.chinese: 渡上是北京市一個高檔別墅小區。

sentences.english: No. 8 West Jiangtai Rd, Lido Hotel 1st Floor.
sentences.chinese: 北京市朝陽區，西將臺路8號，麗都酒店一層。

definition: Haidian inner district of northeast Beijing, includes Peking University, Tsinghua University 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 da4 xue2] and Zhongguancun 中關村|中关村[Zhong1 guan1 cun1]
